text: Lucasfilm Animation is an American television and movie animation company. It is the animation division of Lucasfilm Ltd.. It is known for the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. The division became part of Disney Television Animation company after Disney bought Lucasfilm for $4,000,000,000. Their logo included R2-D2. Lucasfilm Singapore moved into a new building at the beginning of 2014. ==Products== *Star Wars: Clone Wars television series (2005-2008 (co-produced with Cartoon Network studios) *Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008 TV Series) television series (2008-2014/present)(distributed by Cartoon Network) *Star Wars Rebels television series (2014-present) (co- production with Disney and distributed by Disney XD) *Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles film series (2013/2014)(co-production with WILFILM and LEGO and distributed by Disney XD) *Star Wars: The Clone Wars (film) film (2008) (distributed by Wardner Bros.) *Star Wars: Ewoks (co-production with Nevaland) ==References== Category:American animation studios Category:Companies based in San Francisco Category:2003 establishments in California
title: Lucasfilm Animation
